*Wrath begins walking for the jungle*
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  Fro=
m: THECODE 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Saturday, July 22, 2000 5:02 =
AM
  Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


  "Yes, let's go." Inzola said to Wrath.=
..
    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: ilovealllizards 
    To: nbw=
rpg@egroups.com 
    Sent: Saturday, July 22, 2000 4:53 AM
    Subject: Re:=
 Neo Beast Wars


    Wrath: We could try jungle? *Wrath asks Deemos*
     =
 ----- Original Message ----- 
      From: THECODE 
      To: nbwrpg@egroup=
s.com 
      Sent: Saturday, July 22, 2000 4:39 AM
      Subject: Re: Neo B=
east Wars


      "It's up to you where we start." Deemos said to Wrath...
=
        ----- Original Message ----- 
        From: ilovealllizards 
      =
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
        Sent: Saturday, July 22, 2000 4:27 AM
   =
     Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


        *Wrath nods and smiles* Wrath: W=
here should start? *Wrath asks Inzola and Deemos*
          ----- Original =
Message ----- 
          From: THECODE 
          To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
 =
         Sent: Saturday, July 22, 2000 2:50 AM
          Subject: Re: Neo B=
east Wars


          "Hunting? We hunted down almost everyone already, but=
 sure, we'll come." Inzola said.

          "Good to practice with our new =
beast modes." Deemos said. He patted Wrath on the shoulder.

          "Tho=
se Alliance and Preds will be sorry they wouldn't let us join!" Deemos said=
. Inzola looked at Wrath.

          "The Maximals, most of them just don't=
 got it, but a few stand out, you are one of those few." Inzola said to Wra=
th...
            ----- Original Message ----- 
            From: ilovealll=
izards 
            To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
            Sent: Saturday, Jul=
y 22, 2000 2:40 AM
            Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


            *W=
rath smiles* Wrath: Well......We can go scouting...hmm....I've haven't had =
much to do...We go hunting? *Wrath asks Deemos and Inzola*
              --=
--- Original Message ----- 
              From: THECODE 
              To: =
nbwrpg@egroups.com 
              Sent: Saturday, July 22, 2000 2:13 AM
   =
           Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


              Inzola smiles and sh=
akes Wrath's hand.

              "Nice to meet such a charming and powerfu=
l bot upon my repair." Inzola said. Deemos and Inzola hugged for about 5 se=
conds and then looked back to Wrath.

              "So, what are we suppos=
ed to do right now?" Deemos asked Wrath...
                ----- Original M=
essage ----- 
                From: ilovealllizards 
                To: nb=
wrpg@egroups.com 
                Sent: Saturday, July 22, 2000 12:53 AM
  =
              Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


                Wrath: I am Wra=
th and you must be the Inzola that Deemos spoke about. A pleasure to meet y=
ou. *Wrath extends his hand for a hand shake*
                  ----- Origi=
nal Message ----- 
                  From: THECODE 
                  To: n=
bwrpg@egroups.com 
                  Sent: Saturday, July 22, 2000 12:20 AM=

                  Subject: Neo Beast Wars


                  Deemos looke=
d at the CR Chamber when it beeped. Inzola came out and looked around.

   =
               "Maximal base, it's crude but it'll do." Inzola said. Deemos=
 laughed.

                  "Who are you?" Inzola asked Wrath.

          =
        Gangon's spark is still waiting.

                  Artist runs aro=
und in a circle, playing his stupid games he believed exercises him. He run=
s away from the Maximal base and to a mountain. He runs into the mountain a=
nd an avalanche starts, Artist is burried, various thoughts pass through hi=
s mind. Hours later, he awakes.

                  "Oh, that was some blow,=
 but I'll go with the flow." Artist said.

                  "Plintissa? Wh=
ere are you my love? Come on out, Turtle Dove!" Artist called out. He remem=
bered that she was in the desert. His comm unit and compass were working, s=
o he ran to Plintissa. Plintissa looked up at him coldly.

                =
  "Plintissa dear? You don't remember me? For me death was near." Artist sa=
id. Plintissa looked up in shock and flew into Artist's arms. Artist laughe=
d and they kissed. After the kiss.

                  "Do me a favor, Artis=
t, stop using rhymes." Plintissa said. She kissed him.

                  "=
Okay, I won't rhyme, we'll have a good time! Oops!" Artist said. They both =
laughed and Artist took Plintissa to a grassy plain.

                  Dra=
cona held up her scanning device in front of Scorponok's face.

           =
       "I can find that device I lost." Dracona said.

                  "T=
hen I'll give it to the Predacons, it's a piece of my blaster, it is an ice=
 gun." Dracona said. She looked at Scorponok with big beautiful eyes. Sinis=
ter and Sinesis stared at her, mouths agape.

                  The Radicon=
s sat there still...
